Pre-Game Insights: Ruturaj Gaikwad was named in India's T20I squad for the New Zealand series, but will be forced to withdraw due to wrist pain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India recently swept New Zealand 3-0 in a three-match One-Day International series.
Ravindra Jadeja has returned to competitive action following a lengthy injury layoff.
Others: Ruturaj Gaikwad filed a complaint with the BCCI following a Ranji Trophy match between Maharashtra and Hyderabad in which he scored 8 and 0.
Gaikwad has been sent to the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru for rehabilitation.
